name: The Innovators Crowd
tag_list: sharing-of-ideas, start-up-business, business-support, business-help, entrepreneurs, social-network
overview: We’re a team of two, we believe in a world were the process of transforming ideas into profitable businesses is simplified, we believe in bringing people together to connect, share and collaborate and in doing so to inspire one another to create awesome businesses. We provide a platform in the form of The Innovators Crowd to help people to share their business ideas and receive feedback from other members. The platform allows members to search and connect with people to work and collaborate to develop and bring ideas to life, but that’s not all we also bring people together offline by hosting regular events like demo days we’re members are given the chance to showcase their start-ups, we also team up with companies to hold workshops to provide our members with the opportunity to learn new skills.
